item.title: State, Explain, Link - An all-purpose writing technique
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction State, explain, link is a basic style for organizing and explaining ideas in an understandable way. This technique may have many names, but in essence it is a way to organize paragraphs in roughly 3 sentences or more:
